data.title: Learn About the Architecture
data.meta_description: The infrastructure required to deploy Oracle Enterprise Performance Management (Hyperion) applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure includes compute instances, networking components, storage resources, and databases. To deploy and manage your cloud topology efficiently, define the infrastructure as code in Terraform configuration files.
